review: The device works great, however, I am disappointed by Amazon Prime.  Website advertises many TV shows, including House of Cards.  After setting the device up (easy) I found that only episode one of season one is available for Amazon Prime.  All other episodes cost money.  The content I have viewed is perfect with no streaming issues wirelessly on my home network. I wish Amazon had been A little clearer about the content that is available and state that it is limited
author: Kent Reimers

review: It's so simple that my parents can use it!!!!!
author: Aries Robillos

review: I can't tell you how easy it was to just hook up the box and it was ready to 'rock&roll;'!  Although it can be overwhelming to view what's available I find it easier to search on my desktop and add it to the 'watchlist'. Buying a movie or series is much easier than ordering it and having it shipped then plug it into the DVD player.  I just wish there were more 'Prime' Movies and Series added to the list but I can't complain... the selections are overwhelming!  Other than that AMAZON Fire TV is awesome!
author: Doreen

review: Works well, easy to install. Enjoy the entertainment.
author: Randy Johnson

review: Was easy to install, is easy to use.  Has all the shows I want to watch.  I love the parental controls, and the fact that I am able to add shows to my watchlist on the internet, and then watch them on my television.
